events.title: Sunday Worship Service
events.description: Join us for a powerful time of worship, prayer, and an inspiring sermon. All are welcome!

events.title: Bible Study & Fellowship
events.description: A midweek gathering for in-depth Bible study and discussion. Light refreshments will be served.

events.title: Youth Revival Night
events.description: An energetic and uplifting night of worship, testimonies, and a message designed for young people.

events.title: Community Outreach & Charity Drive
events.description: Join us as we serve the community by distributing food, clothing, and sharing the love of Christ.
